moves.1. e4 c5 2. d4: Right away I head towards the Schara-Hennig Gambit. (Almost as good as the Danish gambit)
moves.2... cxd4 3. c3 d6: ? A bit inaccurate. Better is d5.
moves.7... Bd7 8. Qa4: Maybe not the best but sharpest.
moves.14. bxc3 Nc6 15. Rd1: Time to push the queen around!
moves.16... Qa5 17. O-O: Another pawn goes for another tempo.
moves.19. Qh4 Qg7: ?? Better Qh8. This will go sour.
moves.20... b6 21. Rc1: An immediate Nxe6!! is good but that can wait...
moves.21... Ne5: What else was there to do?
